trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Fornece dados para o evento de <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem" /> .

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem> event occurs when a visual aspect of an owner-drawn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> changes.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem> evento ocorre quando um aspecto visual de um desenho proprietário <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> alterações.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs> specifies the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object to use to draw the panel, the <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle> object in which to draw the panel, the panel identification number, state information about the panel, and the panel to draw.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs> Especifica o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> objeto a ser usado para desenhar o painel, o <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle> objeto no qual desenhar o painel, o número de identificação do painel, informações de estado sobre o painel e o painel para desenhar.

trans-unit.source: You can use the data provided by this class in an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem> event to create custom-drawn panels in your application's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar os dados fornecidos por essa classe em um manipulador de eventos para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem> eventos para criar painéis desenhos personalizados em seu aplicativo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> controle.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A> property, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventHandler> delegate, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs> class, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle> enumeration and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs.Panel%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A> propriedade, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventHandler> delegado, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs> classe, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle> enumeração e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs.Panel%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: To run the example, paste the following code in a form.
trans-unit.target: Para executar o exemplo, cole o código a seguir em um formulário.

trans-unit.source: Call the `InitializeStatusBarPanels` method in the form's constructor or `Load` method.
trans-unit.target: Chamar o `InitializeStatusBarPanels` método no construtor do formulário ou `Load` método.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> to use to draw the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> a ser usado para desenhar o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> used to render text.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> usado para renderizar texto.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that represents the client area of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> que representa a área de cliente do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" />.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the panel in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar" /> control.
trans-unit.target: O índice de base zero do painel no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection" /> do controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar" />.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState" /> values that represents state information about the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState" /> que representa as informações de estado sobre o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> that represents the panel to draw.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> que representa o painel a ser desenhado.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs" /> class without specifying a background and foreground color for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs" /> sem especificar uma cor de primeiro plano e de tela de fundo para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> to use to draw the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> a ser usado para desenhar o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> used to render text.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> usado para renderizar texto.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that represents the client area of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> que representa a área de cliente do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" />.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the panel in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar" /> control.
trans-unit.target: O índice de base zero do painel no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection" /> do controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar" />.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState" /> values that represents state information about the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState" /> que representa as informações de estado sobre o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> that represents the panel to draw.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> que representa o painel a ser desenhado.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> values that represents the foreground color of the panel to draw.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> que representa a cor de primeiro plano do painel a ser desenhado.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> values that represents the background color of the panel to draw.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> que representa a cor da tela de fundo do painel a ser desenhado.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs" /> class with a specified background and foreground color for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" />.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs" /> com uma cor de primeiro plano e de tela de fundo especificada para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> to draw.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> a ser desenhado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> to draw.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> a ser desenhado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs.Panel%2A> property enables you to obtain the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> that needs to be drawn.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs.Panel%2A> propriedade permite que você obtenha o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> que precisa ser desenhado.

trans-unit.source: You can use this information within the event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem> event of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control to perform drawing tasks on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar essas informações dentro do manipulador de eventos para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem> eventos de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> controle para executar tarefas de desenho de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventHandler> delegate, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs> class, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle>, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs.Panel%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventHandler> delegado, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs> classe, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle>e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs.Panel%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: To run the example, paste the following code in a form.
trans-unit.target: Para executar o exemplo, cole o código a seguir em um formulário.

trans-unit.source: Call the `InitializeStatusBarPanels` method in the form's constructor or `Load` method.
trans-unit.target: Chamar o `InitializeStatusBarPanels` método no construtor do formulário ou `Load` método.
